Articles.Content:
Hello kerbonauts!  This isn't really a challenge but more like a competition.  Basically what you need to do is to bring our vehicle to a planet (can be planet mod) and show us screenshots of your mission.

 

Rules:

No cheating, like no hyperedit, or from the Alt-F12 menu.

Show us screenshots of your rockets/crafts design that bring our vehicle to the planet + screenshots of you landing safely on the planet.

 

Prize:

We will select the ones that we like and your username will be engraved on our future vehicles.

I really don't care for the prize so I pass. But they look like funny vehicles to me.
Maybe if I toy around with them I'll see time for some nice pics.

Must the screenshots be completely stock? May they be rendered? preffered I take it
Are visual mods liked, or condemned?


 

Edited April 5, 2017 by Razorforce7

5 hours ago, Razorforce7 said:

I really don't care for the prize so I pass. But they look like funny vehicles to me.
Maybe if I toy around with them I'll see time for some nice pics.

Must the screenshots be completely stock? May they be rendered? preffered I take it
Are visual mods liked, or condemned?


 

You can do whatever you want with the screenshots or use any mods as long as it shows the design of your craft getting our vehicles to a planet.  Therefore, no hyperedit or mods that "teleport".
